availability_zones_tooltip_message: At this time, only {{enabledZone}} availability zones are available.
checking_instance_title: Checking if new $t(common:kafka) instances are available
cloud_region_description: More cloud regions are available with a subscription. <0>Learn more about cloud regions</0>.
create_instance_name_helper_text: Must start with a letter and end with a letter or number. Valid characters include lowercase letters from a to z, numbers from 0 to 9, and hyphens ( - ).
create_instance_name_helper_text_name_ta: {{name}} already exists. Try a different name.

form_errors.over_quota_message: The selected size requires more streaming units. Your organization has {{streamingUnits}} of {{maxStreamingUnits}} streaming units remaining. To deploy a new instance, reduce its size, delete an existing one first, or <0>contact us</0> to add more streaming units to your account.
form_errors.trial_unavailable_message: All available trial instances are currently in use. Try again later.
form_errors.trial_region_unavailable_message: The selected cloud provider region is temporarily unavailable. Select another region or try again in a few hours.
form_errors.region_unavailable_message: The selected cloud provider region is temporarily unavailable. Select another region or try again later.

instance_creation_time_alert: Your Kafka instance will be ready for use shortly after creation.

kafka_status_popover.header_content: This will be ready shortly. In the meantime, you can create a service account under the <0>Connection tab.<0>
kafka_status_popover.header_content_with_error: In the meantime, you can create a service account under the <0>Connections tab.</0> If your Kafka instance continues to take longer than expected, <1>open a support case.</1>
kafka_status_popover.header_content_with_warning: In the meantime, you can create a service account under the <0>Connection tab.<0>

pending.description: Passed quota check and awaiting creation
pending.title: Creation pending

kafka_status_popover.title: Creating instance

kafka_status_warning_or_error_title: This is taking longer than expected.

modal_alerts.regions_unavailable_message: Cloud provider regions are temporarily unavailable. Try again later.
modal_alerts.over_quota_message: Your organization has {{maxStreamingUnits}} streaming units available which are already in use. To deploy a new instance, delete an existing one first or <0>contact us</0> to add more streaming units to your account.
modal_alerts.over_quota_title: Your organization has no streaming units remaining.
modal_alerts.trial_available_message: The trial has a duration of {{time}} hours. If you are interested in using this service in production, go to our <0>Streams for Apache Kafka Overview</0> page to see what options are available during creation and learn how to contact us.
modal_alerts.trial_available_title: You can create a trial instance to evaluate this service.
modal_alerts.trial_unavailable_message: All available trial instances are currently in use. Try again later.
modal_alerts.trial_used_message: You can deploy 1 instance at a time. To deploy a new instance, delete your existing one first. If you are interested in using this service in production, go to the <0>Streams for Apache Kafka Overview</0> to see what options are available during creation and learn how to contact us.
modal_alerts.trial_used_title: You already have an instance running

quick_start_guide_message: Need help getting started? Follow our quick start guide.
size_help_content: Size of a Kafka instance is based on streaming units. The number of streaming units defines the capacity, resources, and limits of an instance. An instance with a larger size can handle higher loads and process larger amounts of events, has more storage, and can handle more clients and connections.
standard_kafka_size_description: Learn how to add streaming units to your account
standard_kafka_streaming_unit: Your organization has {{count}} streaming unit remaining
standard_kafka_streaming_unit_zero: Your organization has no streaming units remaining
standard_kafka_streaming_unit_one: Your organization has {{count}} streaming unit remaining
standard_kafka_streaming_unit_other: Your organization has {{count}} streaming units remaining
sizes_missing: Select a cloud provider and region to find the available sizes
sizes_loading: Loading available sizes for the selected cloud provider and region
trial_kafka_size_description: With a subscription, you can select a size for your instance. Changing the size allows you to increase limits such as ingress, egress, and storage. The limits that you get with a trial instance are listed under Details.
all_region_unavailable_helper_text: All regions in the selected cloud provider are temporarily unavailable. Select another cloud provider or try again later.
some_region_unavailable_helper_text: One or more regions in the selected cloud provider are temporarily unavailable. Select an available region or try again later.
trial_all_region_unavailable_helper_text: All regions in the selected cloud provider are temporarily unavailable. Select another cloud provider or try again later.
trial_some_region_unavailable_helper_tex: One or more regions in the selected cloud provider are temporarily unavailable. Select an available region or try again later.
